Serving you up news about the Bylines Network!

The #BylinesNetwork is a family of 10 online citizen journalism publications representing different regions, nations and accents of the UK. Progressive & internationalist, we like our democracy strong - locally, nationally and internationally.

This account provides the main chat for Bylines Network as a whole.

Old, grumpy git. I don't eat Tofu, but am otherwise a fully paid up member of the 'Wokerati' so reviled by our Home Secretary.

I've been a student of Classical Guitar since retiring, and can now read music reasonably. I've played Acoustic Guitar, intermittently, for most of my adult life. I've also taken up the Mandolin in recent years. I'm studying Trad Irish and Bluegrass styles. And. Loving. It!
Just learning about hashtags... #fbpe #wokerati #ClassicalGuitar #Mandolin #MMT

Member of Liverpool City council for 40 years and councillor for the world famous Penny Lane Ward. Lord Mayor of Liverpool, chair of LAMIT, the Local Authority Mutual Investment Trust. Chair of QS Impact. Husband of the lovely Alderman Erica Kemp CBE, Dad to 3 and Grandpa to 5.
